summary: Complete VPS pre-deployment testing for WorldAuto marketplace. All critical features tested and working: authentication (both accounts), homepage, deposit page, radio player, shipping options, and all APIs.
passed_tests: Frontend: Homepage loads correctly with hero section
Frontend: Deposit page (/deposer) loads correctly (no blank page)
Frontend: All shipping options visible (Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Chronopost, Boxtal)
Frontend: Radio player opens and plays audio
Frontend: Login flow works correctly for both accounts
critical_code_review_comments: All critical functionality is working correctly in preview environment
Authentication system working with bcrypt password hashing
Radio player functional with 5 stations configured
Shipping options (Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Boxtal) all visible and selectable
Deposit page loads correctly - no blank page issue
Image and video upload sections present and functional

homepage.hero_section: ✅ WORKING - Title: La marketplace auto pour tous

deposit_page.shipping_options: ✅ ALL VISIBLE (Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Chronopost, Boxtal, etc.)

seed_data_creation: Database initialized with init_db.py - 2 user accounts created
context_for_next_testing_agent: Complete VPS pre-deployment testing done. All features working: authentication (both accounts), homepage, deposit page (no blank page), radio player, shipping options. Ready for VPS deployment. If issues occur on VPS, check: 1) MONGO_URL environment variable, 2) Password hashes in database, 3) JWT_SECRET consistency.
